treatment-md.title: Cycreon floricola subsp. floricola Arriaga-Varela, Wong, Kirejtshuk & Fikacek, 2018, ssp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Review of the flower-inhabiting water scavenger beetle genus Cycreon (Coleoptera, Hydrophilidae), with descriptions of new species and comments on its biology
